summary.span: 命名空间的成员可以以编程的方式创建符合 W3C Speech Recognition Grammar Specification Version 1.0（语音识别语法规范版本 1.0）(SRGS) 的语法。

span.span: With the members of the namespace, you can programmatically create grammars that comply with the W3C Speech Recognition Grammar Specification Version 1.0 (SRGS).
